description: This PR adds interactive greeting and sets up the library structure.

chapters.title: Interactive Greeting
chapters.description: Replace the static hello with an interactive prompt that reads the user's name.

hunks.note: Added stdin import and changed the greeting to read user input.

chapters.title: Library Setup
chapters.description: Create the library crate with a public module and version function.

hunks.note: Helper function scaffolding for future use.
